revision.text:
'''Hoenn''' is the third [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokedex for this region contains 138 Pokemon from Treecko to Deoxys. Uniquely to this region, Deoxys can only be obtained after completing a unique questline and beating round 100 in the [[Battle Frontier]]. [[File:Pokeclickerhoenn.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Hoenn region]] ===List of Hoenn locations=== ====Towns and [[Shops]]==== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Littleroot Town]] || [[Oldale Town]] || [[Mauville City]] || [[Verdanturf Town]] || [[Lavaridge Town]] |- | [[Fallarbor Town]]|| [[Rustboro City]] || [[Petalburg City]] || [[Dewford Town]] || [[Slateport City]] |- | [[Fortree City]] || [[LilyCove City]] || [[Mossdeep City]] || [[Sootopolis City]] || [[Ever Grande City]] |- | [[Pacifidlog Town]] || [[Battle Frontier]] || [[Pokemon League Hoenn]] || || |} ====Routes==== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' {| class="wikitable" |- ! Route 101 - Optimal Dark shard farming route (as of 0.5.7) |- | Wurmple, Poochyena, Zigzagoon |- ! Route 102 |- | Surskit, Poochyena, Wurmple, Lotad, Zigzagoon, Ralts, Seedot, Marill, Goldeen, Magikarp, Corphish |- ! Route 103 |- | Poochyena, Wingull, Zigzagoon, Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp, Wailmer, Sharpedo |- ! Route 104 |- | Poochyena, Wurmple, Marill, Taillow, Wingull, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp |- ! Routes 105, 106, 107, 108, 109 |- | Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp, Wailmer |- ! Route 110 - Optimal Electric shard farming route (as of 0.5.7) |- | Poochyena, Gulpin, Minun, Oddish, Wingull, Plusle, Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp, Wailmer |- ! Route 111 - Optimal Ground shard farming route (as of 0.5.7) |- | Sandshrew, Trapinch, Baltoy, Cacnea, Marill, Goldeen, Magikarp, Barboach, Geodude |- ! Route 112 - Optimal Fire and Fairy shard farming route (as of 0.5.7) |- | Numel, Marill |- ! Route 113 - Optimal Steel shard farming route (as of 0.5.7) |- | Spinda, Slugma, Skarmory |- ! Route 114 |- | Zangoose, Surskit, Swablu, Lotad, Lombre, Seviper, Nuzleaf, Marill, Goldeen, Magikarp, Barboach, Geodude |- ! Route 115 - Optimal Flying shard farming route (as of 0.5.7) |- | Swablu, Taillow, Swellow, Jigglypuff, Wingull, Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp, Wailmer |- ! Route 116 |- | Poochyena, Whismur, Nincada, Abra, Taillow, Skitty |- ! Route 117 |- | Surskit, Poochyena, Oddish, Marill, Illumise, Volbeat, Seedot, Marill, Goldeen, Magikarp, Corphish |- ! Route 118 |- | Zigzagoon, Linoone, Wingull, Kecleon, Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp, Carvanha, Sharpedo |- ! Route 119 |- | Zigzagoon, Linoone, Oddish, Tropius, Kecleon, Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp, Carvanha, Castform, (sunny), (rainy), (snowy) |- ! Route 120 |- | Surskit, Poochyena, Mightyena, Oddish, Marill, Absol, Kecleon, Seedot, Marill, Goldeen, Magikarp, Barboach |- ! Route 121 |- | Poochyena, Shuppet, Mightyena, Oddish, Gloom, Wingull, Kecleon, Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp, Wailmer |- ! Route 122 |- | Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp, Wailmer, Sharpedo |- ! Route 123 |- | Poochyena, Shuppet, Mightyena, Oddish, Gloom, Wingull, Kecleon, Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp, Wailmer |- ! Route 124 |- | Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp, Wailmer, Sharpedo, Clamperl, Relicanth |- ! Route 125 |- | Identical to Route 122 |- ! Route 126 |- | Identical to Route 124 |- ! Route 127 |- | Identical to Route 122 |- ! Route 128 |- | Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp, Luvdisc, Wailmer, Corsola |- ! Route 129 |- | Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Wailord, Magikarp, Wailmer, Sharpedo |- ! Route 130 |- | Wynaut, Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp, Wailmer, Sharpedo |- ! Route 131 |- | Identical to Route 122 |- ! Routes 132, 133, 134 |- | Tentacool, Wingull, Pelipper, Magikarp, Wailmer, Sharpedo, Horsea |} ====Dungeons==== {| class="wikitable" |- ! [[Rusturf Tunnel]] |- | Whismur |- ! [[Fiery Path]] |- | Machop, Grimer, Koffing, Slugma, Numel, Torkoal |- ! [[Jagged Pass]] |- | Machop, Numel, Spoink |- ! [[Mt. Chimney]] |- | Zubat, Poochyena, Numel |- ! [[Meteor Falls]] |- | Zubat, Golbat, Goldeen, Magikarp, Barboach, Solrock, Lunatone |- ! [[Petalburg Woods]] |- | Poochyena, Zigzagoon, Wurmple, Silcoon, Cascoon, Taillow, Shroomish, Slakoth |- ! [[Granite Cave]] |- | Zubat, Abra, Geodude, Makuhita, Aron, Sableye, Mawile, Nosepass |- ! [[New Mauville]] |- | Magnemite, Voltorb, Magneton, Electrode |- ! [[Mt. Pyre]] |- | Shuppet, Duskull, Vulpix, Wingull, Meditite, Chimecho |- ! [[Shoal Cave]] |- | Zubat, Golbat, Spheal, Tentacool, Magikarp, Wailmer, Snorunt |- ! [[Cave of Origin]] |- | Zubat, Golbat, Sableye, Mawile, Exploud, Kyogre (beat Elite Four), Groudon (beat Elite Four) |- ! [[Sky Pillar]] |- | Golbat, Sableye, Claydol, Banette, Mawile, Altaria, Dusclops, Rayquaza |- ! [[Seafloor Cavern]] |- | Zubat, Golbat, Tentacool, Magikarp, Wailmer |- ! [[Victory Road Hoenn]] |- | Zubat, Golbat, Whismur, Loudred, Makuhita, Aron, Mawile, Meditite, Geodude, Goldeen, Magikarp,
Barboach, Whiscash, Hariyama, Lairon, Medicham, Graveler |- ! [[Sealed Chamber]] |- | Zubat, Golbat, Tentacool, Regirock, Regice, Registeel |} ====Unique Location(s)==== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Battle Frontier]] |} ====Roaming Pokemon==== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokemon !! Requirement(s) |- | Latios || rowspan=3 | Beat the Elite Four |- | Latias |- | Jirachi |} [[Category:Regions]]
revision.comment: Kanto reference typo changed to Hoenn

Uniquely to this region, Deoxys can only be obtained after completing a unique questline and beating round 100 in the [[Battle Frontier]].
